title: 4 shot to death in Pembroke Township
content:
Kankakee County Sheriff's police say four shooting deaths — including a triple homicide that killed a father and his two sons — in Pembroke Township over the weekend are likely connected, but they would not say exactly how.
Just before 1 p.m. on Sunday, a family member discovered the bodies of three men, Reginald Neal, 56, and his two sons, Dangelo Neal, 24; and Davante Hopkins, 21, all who had been shot multiple times inside their home on 15500E Road.
